# Html Files Created from Rules

```{r echo = FALSE}

path = 'docs/html'

files = dir(path, pattern = '.html$')

file_paths = paste0('html', '/', files)
  
links = paste0('<a target=_blank href=', file_paths, '>',files, '</a>')

```

```{r echo = FALSE }
mdown_list = paste0("- [",files,"](html/", files, ")  " ) %>%
  paste( collapse = '\n')
```
